cause.description:
The violence in our media today is available to almost anyone. Kids can turn on the TV and watch a violent show with the switch of the channel. Youth can buy video games such as Grand Theft Auto that has a massive amount of violence that could influence their behaviour, just check the studies.
1. Kids and youth need to be restricted on what types of media they get access to.
2. People need to become aware of what violence in our media can do.
3. Parents should know what their kids are watching and playing.
cause.mission: Reduce who can get access to certain media that has violent material in it.
cause.name: Violence In Media
